title: UPDATE 1-Charles Taylor warns on FY profit
author: Reuters Staff
description: * Says adjusting services division performed below its view
cleaned_text: * Says adjusting services division performed below its profit (Adds details) Jan 28 (Reuters) - Insurance consultancy Charles Plc [CHAT.L](/companies/CHAT.L) its adjusting-services business. Charles Taylor had said on Nov. 16 that it expects earnings for the full-year towards the lower end of its view. The company's adjusting-services division -- which provides advice to insurers and shipowners -- was slightly weaker-than-expected, hurt by lower level of activity before the year-end, the company said in a statement. The company derives nearly 50 percent of its division. However, the company's non-life insurance interest, which is part of its larger insurance support services division, is expected to post better-than-expected post-tax results. Charles Taylor's shares, which have shed 16 percent since Nov. 16, closed at 153 pence on Thursday on the London Stock Exchange. (Reporting Arora leading source of agenda-setting financial insight.
